segments.text: I know . I think it may rain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the middle of summer , it shouldn't rain today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , especially since it's ninety degrees outside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , it would be horrible if it rained and it was hot outside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really wish it wasn't so hot every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . I can't wait until winter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like winter too , but sometimes it gets too cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd rather be cold than hot .
segments.speaker: S1
